newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.75 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.75 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 26.786 to the dollar after Friday's fixing at 26.856, and at 17.798 to the mark from 17.802.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +2.75 percent, after a deviation of +2.65 on Friday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +2.72.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
